title: Successful login with valid credentials and correct user role
description: Verify that a user with valid credentials and appropriate role can log in and access the permitted modules.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password for a user with a specific role (e.g., reception)
Click the login button
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the permitted dashboard or module

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure the system does not allow access when invalid username or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username and/or incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify that login is denied and an appropriate error message is displayed

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Validate that users can only access modules and functionalities according to their permission levels.

steps.description: Login as a user with restricted role (e.g., kitchen staff or reception)
Attempt to access an administrative or unauthorized module (e.g., backup restoration or user management)
Verify access is denied and an appropriate message or redirection occurs

title: Interactive reservation map drag-and-drop reservation movement
description: Verify drag-and-drop functionality in the reservation Gantt-style map updates reservation dates and status correctly.

steps.description: Login as a reception user
Navigate to the reservation map
Drag a reservation to a new date or time slot
Verify that reservation details reflect the new date/time and the changes are persisted

title: Click on reservation to show detailed information modal
description: Ensure clicking a reservation item opens a modal or detail view displaying comprehensive guest and booking info.

steps.description: Login as a reception user
Navigate to the reservation map
Click on a reservation entry
Verify a detail modal is shown with guest data, booking dates, and other relevant info

title: Create new manual reservation via backend service
description: Validate the backend service accepts and creates new reservations given valid input data.

steps.description: Prepare valid reservation data including guest details and room/dates
Call the reservation service API or function to create a new reservation
Verify the reservation is created, stored in the database, and assigned a unique ID

title: Reject creation of reservation with conflicting dates or invalid data
description: Ensure the backend service rejects reservation requests that overlap existing bookings or have invalid attributes.

steps.description: Prepare reservation data with dates overlapping existing confirmed booking
Submit data to the reservation service for creation
Verify the service rejects the request with an appropriate error message
Prepare reservation data with missing mandatory fields or invalid formats
Submit data to reservation service
Verify the service rejects the request due to invalid input

title: Read reservation data from JSON and Excel files
description: Confirm the reservation service can successfully parse and load reservation data from both JSON and Excel formats.

steps.description: Prepare valid JSON file containing reservation data
Use the reservation service to load reservations from the JSON file
Verify reservations are loaded correctly and accurately
Prepare valid Excel file containing reservation data
Use reservation service to load reservations from Excel file
Verify reservations are loaded correctly matching the Excel data

title: Admin cancel consumption with justification and audit log entry
description: Validate that only administrators can cancel consumption entries via API by providing justification and that all cancellations are logged properly.

steps.description: Login as administrator
Invoke the consumption cancellation API providing valid consumption ID and a non-empty justification
Confirm the consumption is cancelled successfully and the action is recorded in the audit log with justification
Attempt to cancel consumption without justification or with empty justification
Verify the API rejects the request with a validation error
Login as a non-administrator user
Try to invoke the consumption cancellation API
Verify access is denied with appropriate security error

title: Automatic backup creation and restoration via dashboard
description: Verify the system triggers automatic backups as configured and allows manual restoration from backup interface with status monitoring.

steps.description: Verify system configuration is set for automatic backups (local and complete)
Trigger backup creation manually from the backup dashboard
Confirm backup is successfully created and logged in the dashboard
Select a backup from the dashboard to restore
Initiate restoration process
Verify restoration completes successfully and system data is reverted to backup state

title: Backup failure handling and error messaging
description: Test system behavior when automatic or manual backup fails due to disk space or permission errors, ensuring proper error reporting.

steps.description: Simulate failure conditions like insufficient disk space or access rights
Trigger backup creation manually or wait for automatic backup
Confirm backup fails with explicit error messages displayed in dashboard logs

title: Real-time synchronization of minibar products between governance and reception
description: Validate that products launched in governance are synchronized via API in real time with reception minibar product list.

steps.description: Login as governance user and add or update minibar product entries
Observe reception minibar product list via reception interface
Verify minibar product list in reception updates immediately to reflect changes made in governance

title: Concurrent table to room transfer with lock and rollback
description: Test the atomic transfer process of restaurant tables to hotel rooms with concurrency control and rollback on failure.

steps.description: Login to restaurant module and initiate transfer of a table to a hotel room
Simulate concurrent transfer attempts on the same table
Validate that only one transfer succeeds with proper file locks, others fail with concurrency error
Simulate an error during transfer process
Verify the process rolls back and no inconsistent data remains

title: Departmental logging and audit trail for all user actions
description: Ensure all actions by users in various modules generate detailed logs with timestamps and user identities.

steps.description: Perform actions in different modules such as reservations, consumption cancellation, backup, and minibar updates
Access the audit log for the respective modules
Verify logs contain timestamps, user IDs, action details, and relevant metadata for all performed operations

title: Configuration manager load and validate system configuration
description: Test the Configuration Manager service can load and validate required system configuration parameters and file paths correctly.

steps.description: Invoke configuration manager to load system configs
Verify all expected configuration keys are loaded with correct types and valid values
Modify configuration with invalid values or missing keys
Verify the system detects invalid configuration and throws appropriate errors or warnings
